description: This file defines the NotesListFragment class, a UI component that displays a list of notes with functionality for searching, deleting, and navigating to note editing.

classes.name: NotesListFragment
classes.description: Fragment displaying a list of notes with search and delete capabilities.

methods.description: Creates a new instance of NotesListFragment.
